channel.title: Change money?
channel.description: Iwas wondering how to change how whe you click on an item in the game say for instance, i want to know how much a phat is and i click on that item it says 300000000. how do i make it look more organized and like actually show that its 300m instead of all those ugly zeros ?? thanks smerf45 !! :rolleyes:

item.title: Change money?
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

You can change the Examine information I guess, or search for the examine information to make it send 2 messages saying the price on the second line. How would you do that, no clue. I have never really thought about doing something like this.

Read full topic
